description: With constant exercise and a diet of health foods, Matt Hollis is not only an outstanding athlete, but his excellent health has given him an enormous sexual appetite.  It's not unusual for Matt to cum at least five times a day.  Taking time out from scuba diving, he comes ashore long enough to relieve his big horny cock and juice-filled balls in an exploding climax.  Matt Hollis is a true sexual athlete.
title: Ramcharger
